actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard rocket launching site in accordance with the act of August 25, 1916, as amended.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire and maintain the site in Auburn, Massachusetts, on which Dr. Robert H. Goddard launched the first liquid-propelled rocket. Authorizes appropriations as necessary to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard rocket launching site in accordance with the act of August 25, 1916, as amended.
